text: The Hainish Cycle is the setting for a number of science fiction books and stories that were written by Ursula K. Le Guin. ==List of books== * The Dispossessed (1974) - Urras-Anarres (Tau Ceti) * The Word for World is Forest (1976) - Athshe/New Tahiti * Rocannon's World (1964) - Rokanan (Fomalhaut II) * Planet of Exile (1966) - Werel (Gamma Draconis III) * City of Illusions (1967) - Terra * The Left Hand of Darkness (1969) - Gethen * Four Ways to Forgiveness (1995) - Yeowe-Werel * The Telling (2000) - Aka Category:Hainish Cycle
title: Hainish Cycle
